name: Aquatic Massacre
description:
Aquatic Massacre is a Game written for The Indie Games Lab Jam #3 and the theme was "Bullet Hell"

Its a Aquatic shootem up, that was developed and created in 1 week using unity as the framework.

Big Thanks go out to Gapti, "Marshy Mashed a Melon", ABOR & Cookedpatato who all took part in creating this game.

You can find some more information regarding these developers here.

Gapti : Game Design/Unity Programmer  

https://gapti.itch.io/

"Marshy Mashed a Melon" : Music/ SFX

https://soundcloud.com/marshymashedamelon

https://www.youtube.com/user/ciarandg/featured?view_as=subscriber

ABOR: Art/ Game Design

http://aborstudio.itch.io/

http://twitter.com/aborstudio

Cookedpatato:  Art

https://the-nush.itch.io/

A big thanks also for The Indie Games Lab for hosting the Jam, you can find more information regarding jams like this on the above link.
